options.label: Network Warnings
options.tooltip: Show which player has a bad connection in multiplayer games.

options.label: Late Observer Joins
options.tooltip: Allow everybody or buddies only to join the game as observer after it started.

options.label: Chat Timestamp
options.tooltip: Show time that messages are posted in the lobby, gamesetup and ingame chat.

options.label: Share Resources Among Allies on Resign
options.tooltip: Share own remaining resources among allies on resign. (Little Bug, Default Off, Can be tested though.)

options.label: Show Vision Allies Stats
options.tooltip: New window for quick showing team stats to phase, population, resources and killed units.

options.label: Show Observers and Offlines Players
options.tooltip: New window for quick showing Observers and Offlines Players.

options.label: Auto Login
options.tooltip: On prelobby page opening auto-login user. Press escape for abort.

options.label: Highlight buddies
options.tooltip: Highlight user, buddies and their games.

options.label: Highlight smurfs
options.tooltip: Highlight all smurfs so that you can easily identify them

options.label: Auto Away Minutes
options.tooltip: Number of minutes before you are set to auto away.

options.label: Show More Buttons Bar
options.tooltip: Show more buttons bar below chat input auto-hiding (reveal on mouse over).

options.label: I confirm everything is write
options.tooltip: Highlight all smurfs so that you can easily identify them
